screen.my_screen.preview_button_tooltip: Hides the settings overlay to more easily see the preview.
screen.my_screen.view_angle_tip: Please adjust your in-game view to properly see the preview
screen.main_screen.choose_level_tooltip: Configure settings according to specific beacon levels.
screen.main_screen.mix_white_tooltip: Mixes in a white color to make the halo appear brighter.
screen.main_screen.spacing_mid_alpha_too: Opacity of the ambient portion of the halo in pulse mode.
screen.main_screen.spacing_alpha_tooltip: Opacity of the pulse in pulse mode.
screen.level_choose_screen.title: Beacon level settings
screen.level_choose_screen.modded_levels: Adjusting beacon level settings that have been added with mods require this mod to also be installed on the server.
screen.level_config_screen.color_spacing: The halos are colored according to all colored pieces of glass the beacon passes through (multiple different colors are thus possible), with the beacon colors numbered 1, 2, 3, 4... from the outer ring to the inner ring. The interval determines how many halos will be colored the first color before changing to the second color.
config.radar_description: A rotating radar effect, controlled by the opacity slider. The opacity at the tip of the slider is 1.
config.pulse_description: Multiple pulses across the halo, alternating between light and dark. The opacity of both sides are controlled by the pulse mode options.
config.flat_description: A semi-transparent base color without any effects.
config.static_description: An opaque base color without any effects.
